content: copyright ©2015 denise e m bartels b locking is a bit fiddley because of the uneven increases i found it easiest to pin the center spine a straight blocking wire is a big help here and then work from there outwards along the bottom edge lining up the branches as i went i used flexible wires for the top and bottoms edges and by the time i had the bottom edged pined the top had pretty much blocked itself note that some of the leaves won t be totally flat 5 copyright ©2015 denise e m bartels 6 copyright ©2015 denise e m bartels 7 copyright ©2015 denise e m bartels 8 copyright ©2015
